SEARCH
Module com.staticconstants.flowpad.flowpad
Package com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea

Class AIConnector

java.lang.Object
com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea.AIConnector
public class AIConnector extends Object
Handles the connection between the rich text area and AI-based features such as prompt generation, selection tracking, and intelligent content insertion.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs an AIConnector for the given text area controller.

      public void sendQuery(CustomStyledArea<ParStyle,RichSegment,TextStyle> outputArea, String content)
      Sends a predefined query to the AI based on the active prompt type and editor content.
      Parameters:
      outputArea - the area from which the query context is generated
      content - the selected text to send as context

    • sendCustomPrompt

      public void sendCustomPrompt(CustomStyledArea<ParStyle,RichSegment,TextStyle> outputArea, String content, String customPrompt)
      Sends a custom prompt string to the AI using the given text and prompt content.
      Parameters:
      outputArea - the editor context
      content - the user input text
      customPrompt - the user-defined AI prompt

      request - the optional request to send
